_header: There was some time befall a case
_description: Carol of the Passion — ten quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Jhesu fore yowre manie / Yblessid mot yowre body be’

BLRoy20Ai.First Lines:
There was suim teme byfalle a casÞat al the wordel ylore
                    was…
BLRoy20Ai.Last Lines:
…To helle he wente wit ys wowndys fyueÞat was gret pete
                    fore to se
BLRoy20Ai.Editions:
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 126; 1977, 111-12.
